message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $100?
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $95. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my target. How about $105?
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $92. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not willing to go as low as $92, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $92 and my previous offer of $105. How about $98.50?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I've already offered you $98.50, and you're coming back to $90? I'm starting to think you're not serious about buying the product. I'm willing to make one last concession. How about $96?
I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $89. Can you meet me at that price?
